job.title: Senior Software Engineer and Team Leader (1308)
job.description: <strong><u>About The Position<br><br></u></strong>We are looking for an experienced full-stack software engineer to join our software development team with experience designing, building and scaling microservices in a cloud environment. You’ll be working with a team of software engineers to create microservices in AWS, making thousands of Single Digits networks more user-friendly, reliable and scalable. You will follow Agile DevOps processes, build exciting new features, and deliver those features using our automated CI/CD process. Engineers in this position must either have experience with the networking industry, or be quick to learn new skills.<br><br><strong><u>Roles And Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Design and develop reliable and scalable microservices in AWS using Java, React.js, Docker, and AWS platform technologies</li> <li>Design and implement REST APIs using OpenAPI</li> <li>Lead a team of software engineers using Agile DevOps processes and procedures</li> <li>Collaborate with customers and functional experts to understand technical requirements and provide innovative solutions.</li> <li>Other duties as assigned</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul> <li>5-7 years of experience with building scalable event-based microservices with Java and AWS platform services such as EventBridge</li> <li>Experience with DevOps processes in AWS, including EKS and Terraform.</li> <li>Experience with SQL using AWS RDS, as well as NoSQL using DynamoDB</li> <li>1-3 years of team leadership</li> <li>Working knowledge of the networking industry is preferred, including familiarity with networking protocols such as TCP/IP and SNMP as well as experience with access points, switches and firewalls.</li> <li>Scrum master certification preferred</li></ul>
